sqlMap.statement: SELECT TB.CNVSNFUNTNNAME AS "CNVSNFUNTNNAME", TB.CNVSNFUNTNDESC AS "CNVSNFUNTNDESC", TB.CNVSNFUNTNRETUNPTRNIDNAME AS "CNVSNFUNTNRETUNPTRNIDNAME", TB.CNVSNFUNTNPTRNIDNAME AS "CNVSNFUNTNPTRNIDNAME", TB.CNVSNFUNTNCLSNAME AS "CNVSNFUNTNCLSNAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAITR04 TB ORDER BY TB.CNVSNFUNTNNAME

SELECT TB.CNVSNFUNTNNAME AS "CNVSNFUNTNNAME", TB.CNVSNFUNTNDESC AS "CNVSNFUNTNDESC" , TB.CNVSNFUNTNRETUNPTRNIDNAME AS "CNVSNFUNTNRETUNPTRNIDNAME", TB.CNVSNFUNTNPTRNIDNAME AS "CNVSNFUNTNPTRNIDNAME", TB.CNVSNFUNTNCLSNAME AS "CNVSNFUNTNCLSNAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAITR04 TB WHERE TB.CNVSNFUNTNNAME=#cnvsnFuntnName#

SELECT TB.CNVSNFUNTNNAME AS "CNVSNFUNTNNAME", TB.CNVSNFUNTNPARMNAME AS "CNVSNFUNTNPARMNAME", TB.CNVSNFUNTNPARMDESC AS "CNVSNFUNTNPARMDESC", TB.CNVSNFUNTNPARMPTRNIDNAME AS "CNVSNFUNTNPARMPTRNIDNAME", TB.CNVSNFUNTNPARMSERNO AS "CNVSNFUNTNPARMSERNO" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAITR05 TB WHERE TB.CNVSNFUNTNNAME=#cnvsnFuntnName#
